title: 【徵才】工研院 5/8 全球人才線上招募會，報名起跑！(ITRI Global Talent Online Recruitment Fair - Net Zero Technology Developments)
department: 學務處畢業生及校友服務組
author: 黃文雯
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 學務處畢業生及校友服務組 - 黃文雯 - wenwen@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6283
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【徵才】工研院 5/8 全球人才線上招募會，報名起跑！(ITRI Global Talent Online Recruitment Fair - Net Zero Technology Developments)
日期： Thu, 25 Apr 2024 11:38:09 +0800
附檔： 工研院全球人才線上招募會.pdf (879 KB)   
工研院全球人才線上招募會！
由領域專家分享淨零永續議題，
如果您有意投入創新科技研發，想進一步了解職缺訊息，歡迎報名，展開繽紛職涯！
Experts in the field will introduce ITRI's latest Net Zero technology developments.
If you are interested in a career in innovative technology R&D and would like to learn more about our job and internship openings, please join us!

 活動資訊 Event Info：＊Taiwan time（UTC＋8）＊
🎯 5 / 8 (三)  10：00－11：40＊
🍇 會議連結將於 5 / 6 寄送
ITRI Recruiting Team will send the meeting links on May 6.

🎤 招募會以中文演說，活動後提供中英雙語影片
This session will be in Chinese.
After the event, we will make available a video with English subtitles

✨如無法參加線上會議，請填寫報名問卷，將於活動後寄出中英雙語影片
If you can't join the online event, but are interested in the event video with English subtitles,please complete the registration form and we will send the video after the event.

點此立即報名：https://www.surveycake.com/s/Xx6r0
jpg、png、gif、pdf 附檔縮圖（pdf 只顯示第一頁）：
